website_summaries.verdict: While light in the wallet, this option comes through with features you’d only expect in a more expensive lamp.
pros: Offers a nice look that comes in a variety of colors, and three different levels of brightness
Also comes with a USB charger
cons: Some of these lamps arrive with scratches, possibly pointing to a shipping problem

website_summaries.verdict: This trendy LED lamp offers an adjustable neck alongside an affordable price tag.
pros: Available in 5 different colors for users wanting a styled option
Features a built-in USB port for charging phones or other electronics
cons: A few buyers had issues with the built-in USB port not working

customer_reviews.title: FIRE HAZARD!  Body of light started melting!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used this as her desk lamp and mentioned to me that she smelled burning plastic. I turned the light over to find that the lamp was melting and turning brown. See photos - it's not directly under the LED lights, but where the bulb housing attaches to the arm. Clearly, some wiring is faulty and is getting too hot. Amazon should remove it's "Amazon's Choice" label from this piece of crap before someone gets hurt. I wish I had read more of the negative reviews - I would return this if I could.
customer_reviews.author: PlaysWellWithOthers

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk Lamp for a Low Price
customer_reviews.text: I received my Lamp today and am very pleased with it! It's the perfect size for my office and is exactly what I needed. It was inexpensive, shipped fast, and works great with 3 different levels of brightness. I'm really stoked that I can charge my iPhone through it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon & Jason Mears

customer_reviews.title: Read before you purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this, it looks really good on my desk and the three different brightness settings are great. Pros: not bulky, flexible, doesn’t overheat or anything, easy to turn on Cons: the little charging ports on the side don’t work on my lamp(giving 3 stars for that reason), it gets dusty pretty quick, the button is extremely sensitive(this is more good than bad, but still)
customer_reviews.author: Jailene

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Packaging needs to be better.
customer_reviews.text: Like the product. It's a good price but the packaging in the box needs to be better. The lamp hits its own base and scratches itself durning delivery. Decided to keep it as it doesn't interfere with its function.
customer_reviews.author: S. Luong

customer_reviews.title: The one I got looks used!!
customer_reviews.text: Sucks because it seems like a great functioning light! Nice, sleek design but those scratches make me wonder. How good can a product be if these obvious “defects” slip through production.. 🤨 Seriously thinking I am not it’s first owner.
customer_reviews.author: B-boys Mama

customer_reviews.title: Strange Buzz And An Electrical Burning Smell
customer_reviews.text: I've owned and used this lamp for less than 2 weeks. Yesterday, it began emitting a strange buzz. Today, I detected an electrical burning smell and sniffed out the source, which turned out to be the lamp. What next - smoke? I might add that the lamp came with no packing whatsoever. In addition, there was NO instruction booklet and NO product information - just a lamp thrown in a box.
customer_reviews.author: texgirl

customer_reviews.title: Bright and Perfect for any Task.
customer_reviews.text: - Dislike: Honestly, I haven't found anything about this desk lamp that I have not thoroughly enjoyed. - Like/Love: I REALLY love the different brightness settings and how easy it is to alternate between them. The fact that it's and LED lamp AND has a USB port is really just icing on the cake. PHENOMINAL. The versatility and ability to bend the light is probably my favorite part. I can move it the arm as needed without having to move the entire lamp which is a HUGE plus. AND DID I MENTION HOW BRIGHT THIS THING GETS!? In all honesty, I wasn't expecting much, but oh goodness. My expectations were definitely exceeded and I can bet yours will be too.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Potter

customer_reviews.title: Light is fine, USB charger plug useless
customer_reviews.text: **edit - exchanged for new one. One month later, the USB plug has the same issue lol. Good grief. I give up. ** Works fine as a lamp, but the USB plug is useless. USB charging wire will simply slip out at it seems the part that catches and holds the plug in place is defective. The only reason I purchased this over some of the others is bc of charging capabilities, but this fault essentially makes it useless. Light works well though, I will say that. Disappointed though and you can spend your money better elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Love the Product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I gave it 4 stars because the head of the lamp, which is packaged bent over to save space, scratches the base of the lamp. In the reviews that I have read, many other reviewers had the exact same issue. The base is scratched but it did not affect the functioning of the lamp so I kept it. Personally, I would have preferred the lamp in another color such as black but overall, stylish, modern design and bright LEDs. In fact, I keep the brightness on 1, because 2 and 3 are way too bright.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Jay Pee

customer_reviews.title: Great desk lamp!
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is awesome! I purchased because I needed a little light that didn't take up too much space on my desk but powerful enough to light my workspace without using a ceiling light. I like the fact that the lamp features 3 brightness settings ranging from high, medium, low; all using led bulbs. The added bonus was the USB charging port at the base where you can charge your phone or other electronic without having to use a wall outlet. Great lamp at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth P.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for just under 5 months.
customer_reviews.text: Great- but didn’t last quite 5 months. I only use this while prepping patterns and fabric for sewing so it hasn’t been used for a lot of time. The light stopped working for the most part and flutters on and off intermittently. My husband looked on line and it might be because it is plugged into the same power strip as my iron. There were no warnings on the package about plugging it into a source that fluctuates. Too bad as it worked great until it didn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Farms

customer_reviews.title: lasted 6 months
customer_reviews.text: When making the bed, we noticed a burning smell. There must have been a short circuit. Even though the lamp had been off since last night, it was hot to touch and there clearly has been a burning malfunction. Don't like filling land fills with badly designed products. Find something else. Bummer, since I really like the way it functioned.
customer_reviews.author: ekrodg

customer_reviews.title: A must have for work
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize when purchasing this that there were 3 different levels of brightness (yes I know I should’ve read the description more closely) I was so surprised when I opened this and purchased it for my desk at work. The lamp is well made and well worth the money. It went directly from box to desk with no issues and several co workers have commented on it. I have 0 complaints about this and would highly recommend this. The size is perfect too!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S.

customer_reviews.title: Great price, good quality product, very convenient
customer_reviews.text: This was an unbeatable deal for $11! This lamp is very bright and well-made, not super plastic-y like I expected. I only use it on the lowest setting because it’s so bright and the side USB charger is just indispensable! I use it to charge my phone, portable battery, and Kindle interchangeably. It seems like I never forget to recharge things anymore, maybe because it’s so convenient now? This lamp has even become a a discussion piece simply because of the USB charger then people are shocked to find that it was so cheap because the sleek design makes it look more expensive. Great deal, good product. Perfect for your nightstand (how I use it) or desk.
customer_reviews.author: Eblake81

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is such a nice addition to my desk. It really helps to have more light while using my computer. You don’t notice how much you are straining to see until you get better light. I liked this light so much I purchased one to put beside my arm chair. It has 3 levels of intensity and it also charges with a USB port on the side. For around $20, this is a great investment. And it looks nice. I noticed my young grandson using it this morning with his tablet. I think this would make a nice gift for him, along with some LEGOS 🤓.
customer_reviews.author: Ocean Girl

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck I have seen in ages!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a beat up old bulb lamp. Looked at all the fancy new stuff with different eye strain switches, degrees of brightness, phone chargers, sandwich makers etc...........and this sweet little lamp for under $15 does what a lamp is supposed to do..three levelsof light with a touch of a finger. In the dark just rub the base and the lamp comes on. It could be taller with more range of motion but it suits my need........lighting up the keyboard for the computer rather than turning on three overhead lights in the office. Good buy Good product. A friend saw mine and bought two!
customer_reviews.author: spaddriverdavis

customer_reviews.title: Works for me.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, shipped quickly, bright enough for me, charges phone(Samsung S7), touch sensitivity good. Other comments pointed out scuff marks from shipping so I checked it right away. There was a tiny little scuff (about size of a single dot from a ball point pen) only noticeable if you were looking for it on the white surface. I only knocked it down a star because it is a little tippy and slides on my desk. I have the gooseneck swiveled out such that it is not aligned above the base and if I bump it the weight in the base is not enough to keep it from tipping over. The bottom surface does not have an anti-slide material.
customer_reviews.author: Raegrl04

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking desk or nigh-table lamp.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 8 year olds desk. No annoying or hard switches. Very user friendly. On/low, medium, high and off. Each with a tap. Has USB on the side so it’s functional. It also flexes easily and nice. Easy on the eyes. Very sheer. No scratches or damage. Was packaged with bubble wrap. Maybe they wised up. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly P

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS WONDERFUL
customer_reviews.text: PLUGGED IT IN THREE WAYS OF BRIGHT LIGHT. AM SENIOR HELPS ME SEE. CONVENIENT ATTRACTIVE IN IT'S SIMPLICITY USB PORT AND A PHONE CHARGE PORT YOU CAN'T BEAT THIS IT IS AWESOME TIME TO GET UP WITH MODERN TIMES AND I AM ENJOYING IT IMMENSELY LED LIGHTS ARE SO SUPERIOR TRY THESE OR ANY OF THE VERSION. SUPER
customer_reviews.author: @rosebud

customer_reviews.title: Very nice light and inexpensive.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a table next to my recliner to read books. It is very similar to other lights that cost much more. First thoughts are it looks like a quality light. The neck bends to adjust the light to where you want it. There are the brightness levels by pressing the electronic button on the base three times. Low brightness is very bright, and the others are even more so. I mainly use the low brightness, and it's plenty bright. Makes a big difference when reading.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore C.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Enough
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine in November 2019 and I use it every night, typically on the lowest setting. The brightest setting is actually too bright for me, so I almost never go there. The lamp is very modern, sleek, and takes up very little space. Although there is a cable port, I tried charging my phone with the light on and it kept blinking, so it isn't powerful enough to charge another item. It is incredibly effective in aiding me in my decluttering and revamping process.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: It broke less than two weeks after I received it
customer_reviews.author: Dee Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Decent Desk Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my desk at work and like the minimalist design. it had scuff marks on the base like all the other reviews. However, I need it for function. LED assembly was not entirely popped into lamp head. Added pressure and it snapped in properly. I have noticed that the light flickers when a phone is charging in the USB port on the side. If you were judging it on first impressions, probably would rate it 3.5 stars. But, it does what I need it to do for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JBravo7

customer_reviews.title: Fine but with flaws😔
customer_reviews.text: This lamp I got does not have three distinct light levels...pretty much the same amount of light no matter how many times you tap it, which is ok with me since I’m using it as a bed side lamp..also the usb port was too large to keep a usb cable plugged in ...had to pinch it to keep the cable in place..but for the price, I’m fine with the flaws. Update...the flaws turned out to be more than I had stated. Besides it not having but one light level, when you plugged into the usb port the lamp turned off😞
customer_reviews.author: UMA

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again and again!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new lamp for my new sewing table and area, and this little guy here was the perfect fit! I didn’t want a lamp that would take up a ton space on my crafting table, but I knew I wanted one with different light warmth’s for when I photograph my projects! Loved this lamp so much that I purchased one for my son at his desk while he does schooling from home! Also super PLUS it comes with a USB port to charge your phone too! Just love this lamp!
customer_reviews.author: ipo

customer_reviews.title: 2 months working time? Ordered another to make sure
customer_reviews.text: I am ordering this again as the one i ordered october 14th has already stopped working. Mind you i have not used it at all since dec 15th because i have been off work. If the second one last longer I will update my review! Loved the light, but 2 months is not good time duration, not even for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Webster

customer_reviews.title: This light is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day on my desk. It has three levels of brightness--and they are quite bright. I rarely have to go beyond the first level. The lamp itself is sturdy and attractive, and it's touch-controlled, easy to turn on and off. I used to have a lamp for which I needed to always get special bulbs--but this one is a self-contained LED--so easy and so good. I'm glad I purchased it . It's unbelievably inexpensive, and it's really great. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Wise Mind

customer_reviews.title: Great little desk light but scuffed up base
customer_reviews.text: We bought a black and a white one and they are both great in that they take up little space, easy to turn on and off, and have the USB charging port which is very useful. HOWEVER, both of them have scuffed up bases as reported by others who have bought this product. The boxes that they came in were in perfect condition, and the lamps were secured within so they could have been bouncing around during shipping. The scuffing probably happened during the manufacturing/packing process at the factory. Deducting a star for that.
customer_reviews.author: ItsTeatime

customer_reviews.title: I love this lamp!
customer_reviews.text: This shipped super fast and was packaged nicely. It’s actually very pretty and sleek! There are three brightness settings with a sleek touch button design. The goose neck makes it easy to adjust. I pain, draw and write and this lamp is perfect. It mimics real daylight so painting under it is really nice. It is a white/blue toned light so it’s great for art, etc. but I personally wouldn’t use it at my bedside (if you’re wanting a more ambient light) but some people love that and it definitely serves its purpose. It’s light, so you’d want to be careful if it’s on your bedside table rather than a desk. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Nanette Stein

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this lamp! It’s perfect and better than I expected. I love that it’s lightweight and that it has 3 brightness levels. It’s not bulky so it doesn’t take up much room. I use it on my crafting desk and can’t imagine not having it now. Great quality and price too. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great little lamp with a very flexible neck!
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a great little lamp and I love the flexibility of the neck, however if I was to change one thing it would be to have a heavier base. When I bend the neck to a favorable position, often times the lamp tips over with the slightest pressure. Having said that, I definitely would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Blu McComas

customer_reviews.title: Two strikes and you're out
customer_reviews.text: I received one of these lamps but the battery refused to accept a charge. Returned it in exchange for another. Same problem, so had to return the second one, too. Bought a Black & Decker battery desk lamp that works. I suspect that the two duds aren't the only bad ones in Amazon's inventory.
customer_reviews.author: Allenby

customer_reviews.title: I have four.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best lamps ever. I plug my cell phone and make up mirror into them. I have two for each bedroom. The touch sensors are dynamite and it dims and brightens with three different levels. The goose neck is adjustable and the light has daylight wide coverage. I have all white ones, and they look expensive in that color. It matches all my vanity stuff.
customer_reviews.author: QueenDENISE

customer_reviews.title: USB port stopped working after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Too bright, and the USB port stopped working at 1 month. Next time, I would buy one without the port and with a milder yellow toned light. This one is glaringly bright at night.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: I work early in the morning and don't want to turn on all the lights as I'm waking up. So I hunted for a desk lamp that had multiple brightness settings to suit my needs. This 3 way light doesn't get hot to the touch, has an adjustable neck and has a bonus USB port, which is super handy for my work space. It's easy to clean, use and the only set up was to plug it in. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jen K

customer_reviews.title: lamp package has a disclaimer that not all devices can be charged on the usb port
customer_reviews.text: The USB port did not support the charging of my samsung smart phone. Had to look for the disclaimer on the box in small print that the USB may not support all devices for charging. The USB port was an important factor in my choosing to get this product. Did not bother to claim it was defective and request another unit once I read the disclaimer. This should be prominently mentioned in their ads for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Gladstone

customer_reviews.title: Gret little desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, very bright. Only thing I'd like to see to improve it would be a less bright setting. It has 3 settings, and even the lowest is quite bright. For my study at night something much less bright is sufficient. Another improvement would be to be able to switch hue to a more yellow color It is a bright white light, which is great for many things but not as relaxing as a more yellow hue. Allof that said, it's a great little lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Gammacula

customer_reviews.title: Great light for deck or bedside
customer_reviews.text: This is a great reading light for a deck or bedside. I got one for each of my kids and they love the USB port in the base for charging their portable devices at night. On the high setting its quite bright and can be reflected off a wall to provide indirect light and it has lower settings that are better for reading at night or lighting up homework on a desk.
customer_reviews.author: Autobahn97

customer_reviews.title: Revised review: faulty USB port
customer_reviews.text: Update: 18 months later and USB port has quit working, despite having only had the cord be unplugged/replugged approximately 6 times. I only unplugged when I had to travel and take my cord with me, otherwise it just sat plugged into the port on the lamp. Definitely should not have worn out after so little use. Dropped stars from 5 to 1. Great lamp with a small footprint and touch on/off/brightness. Works well to charge phone in usb port.
customer_reviews.author: DanicaW

customer_reviews.title: Good desk light on a budget
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these and use one as a night stand light next to the bed and another on a desk. The light output levels is pretty good, even on low it puts out plenty of light to see my way around the bedroom. The only two things I am not so happy with are the fact that you always have to cycle through all the settings every time you need to turn it off or on. I also don’t like to use it on high for very long as it seems to get fairly warm. For the price I would say it is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kingspeed1320

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT order the IVY LED Desk Lamp with USB portal
customer_reviews.text: This lamp seemed great for the money until 3 months went by! The USB portal doesn't work. I bought it months ago and just took it out of the box 5 months ago. Everything worked great. I was ready to buy my adult children the same lamp. Then my phone stopped charging with the lamp. I bought a new plug and tried again. Nothing. The USB Portal was the major reason I bought this lamp. I needed to be able to work with my phone plugged in. This is useless and I wasted my money. I am going to contact the company for a new one. Stay tuned......
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my kids virtual school desks
customer_reviews.text: The three light settings are very useful. I have these on my kid's desks that they use for school and it allows them to manipulate the angle and amount of light emitted for their class meets. The USB port is also a wonderful addition as an extra place to charge electronics. VERY pleased - plan to order more for other locations in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Great light.
customer_reviews.text: Got this light a couple of weeks ago based on the good reviews. So far I really like it. I like that the tap control switch is conveniently located (top front of the base of the unit). Makes it very ease to access and turn the light on. I also like that it’s a tap switch which works good if you are holding something in your hand. You also don’t ha e to worry about fumbling around looking for the switch in the dark. The light is bright enough for what I need and has three levels of intensity (I normally leave it on the lowest setting).

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressive for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It was purchased for my daughters desk. Its small, has three light settings. Has a USB for her cell phone. Over all, it great, and space saving. I think I may order one for my room. I highly recommend it, its helped me see better in her room, it gives a day light in a room. Update: my other daughter lamp broke so I bought her one too! Excellent lamp
customer_reviews.author: FloridaMommy

customer_reviews.title: Great lamps
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy these are to adjust and they have 3 settings for brightness, just tap the button on the base for low, Medium and high lighting. They also fold down compactly to make more room on my very busy desk.
customer_reviews.author: DreamingofSummer

customer_reviews.title: GreT
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp! Just received it yesterday. It lights up my desk in my home office. The overhead light in the room was never bright enough but this fixes that that. I love the touch control and that it has 3 levels. Will be getting a second for my craft table.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this light for a while, as I wanted to see how well it worked over time. I use it daily and it works just as expected. It’s 3 levels of brightness give me sufficient light, regardless of the conditions in the room and the USB keeps my phone charged while still having the long cord to check it or send texts without limitations. Overall I’d recommend this light as it’s a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: USB port failed after 4 months ☹️
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lamp! So flexible & bright and the USB port for a phone charger is very convenient! It’s a great reading / sewing etc. lamp. Update April 4, 2020: The light still works but the USB port doesn’t. It doesn’t hold the USB tightly so things won’t charge unless you hold the cord constantly. I’ve even tried taping the charge cord on but that doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great task light/perfect for dorm rooms
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp for my daughter to take to college with her last fall. I borrowed it from her when she returned home this past spring and now need to buy another for me to have at home once she returns to school in the fall. It's nice and bright (with 3 brightness settings), it can be manipulated to whatever position in need it and doesn't light too big of an area (which made it perfect for my daughter to be working at her desk while her roommate slept).
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Bogdon

customer_reviews.title: I love this lamp
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is terrific. It's lightweight, just the right size for a desktop or night stand, and is bright! I appreciate that I can adjust the brightness, too. My son saw it and immediately ordered one for himself. Heads up if you do not get a white one: the way the lamp is packaged, the head of the lamp scratches the base of the lamp and leaves marks you can't get off. So I'd advise sticking with the white one, which got marks too, but you don't see them because the lamp base is white.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable, attractive design, works well. I'm pleased and recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little desk lamp to use with my small ladder-type desk and laptop. It sits near a corner by windows so plenty of light during the day. None at night unfortunately and no other lamp fit. This lamp works great! Bright light with 3 levels, bendable so light goes where I want it and I can plug my phone or tablet charger into it. I highly recommend this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Veda Leggett

customer_reviews.title: Nice three brightness setting lamp with a very adjustable neck
customer_reviews.text: I love the USB plugin! Also, this lamp has three brightness settings which makes it perfect for long study sessions when the room starts to get darker from lack of sunlight. It doesn’t flicker like my old lamp, and it doesn’t look bad on my desk. I really like how flexible the neck of this lamp is, I was not expecting it to have a great range of motion.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for about 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I loved this lamp...while it worked! I bought it in November of 2019 and it’s now May 31, 2020 and it’s stopped working. No reason. Worked last night, tonight it doesn’t. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: Half the price, twice the lamp!
customer_reviews.text: This little lamp is exactly what I needed for my studio. The 3 light settings offer enough range to imitate a realistic false light source for paintings. The lamp neck is completely adjustable making it easy to get just the right angle of light. Similar lamps were priced between $17-$65. This is a steal at half the price if you get the white option.
customer_reviews.author: CooKoo.KaChoo

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp for tween desk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this desk lamp for my tween - we had to set up a little desk area in her room due to the new schooling situation this year. This lamp has a very streamlined look to it, the touch point is easy to turn on and off (three different light levels), and she likes that it has a USB port for charging. Would definitely recommend this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Diggityd77

customer_reviews.title: beautiful good quality desk Lamp
customer_reviews.text: i hesitant to order it after reading few bad reviews which seems to me a few bad apples. my daughter loved it, and so far it's working great no issue. brightness level is perfect with 3 level of adjustment. for $9.99 you won't find better than this
customer_reviews.author: Fadi Ghattas

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working properly
customer_reviews.text: At first we absolutely loved this lamp! The time frame for a return closed at the end of jan, and now the touch feature doesn’t work at all. As soon as you plug it in, it comes on and is at the brightest setting, and it only turns off after unplugging it. We are out the cost of the lamp, now, and it no longer serves the purpose we bought it for since we can’t select the brightness we want.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Not a good spend
customer_reviews.text: It malfunctioned after just 1 month of use. Now it only works for minutes on high. It gets hot and turns off. The only way to turn it back on it to unplug it, then plug it back in. I am very disappointed. They did refund my money.
customer_reviews.author: FanAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Umm 😐
customer_reviews.text: i believe I purchased the lamp in feb, it after the first use which was when I opened it just to check out light and see how it works I was amazed by the quality of brightness and it comes with three adjustable settings. So I didn’t even have it on long. However when I needed it to do and actual nail set it did not work I only had it for three days I was going to buy another one but I’ll be damn if I’m paying 21.00 and the first one ain’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Djenne House

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING LIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to dislike about this great lamp. All three light settings (just tap the icon) are very nice. Highly recommend this for students, people who sew, do artwork or any other task requiring a clean, clear type of lighting. It even has a USB port for charging your phone or whatever, and the neck bends pretty much any way you want it; good even for indirect lighting behind something you want to show off in your home.
customer_reviews.author: G. Walters

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived prior to scheduled date/time. Excellent price for the white color. Very bright. Nice flexibility with stand. Yes, there is a slight area at base where upper lamp rubbed and left a minor imperfection. I don't care about that. But, other reviewers are correct,... a simple piece of cardboard would have eliminated this problem. Bought 2. They're for my craft/sewing/jewelry making space. They are GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: Rochester

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp! Would buy again in a heart beat!
customer_reviews.text: This little puppy is near perfect. Someone wrote that on its brightest setting, you might consider wearing sunglasses 😎 No joke! I love that you can maneuver the lamp to change how light is directed, however, the base is a little too light and may fall over in some configurations. This should not stop you from buying it, only a heads up!
customer_reviews.author: The Discerning Consumer

customer_reviews.title: she cute
customer_reviews.text: three adjustable lights one button that does it what else, the neck is bendy so u can easily cram it into ur bag if need be, the charger portion is the most cumbersome part honestly and it takes up 2~3 spaces on the... blanking on the word.. but you know? where u plug in multiple outlets anyways good lamp! the box says itll last u 20 years if u use it around 3 hours a day HAHAHAHA 20 years i study around 6-9 a day so as long as this survives through my next five years of college ill send it off and wont even be mad
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Kang

customer_reviews.title: Great for illuminating video calls. Well made, I got a second one.
customer_reviews.text: Got one, liked it. Got another one. Liked that too. Reliable. Compact. Lightweight. USB jack is a bonus (keep that phone charged). Bright. I use it at my desk, mainly for some frontal illumination during video calls. Too bright? Tilt the head to the side till the brightness is just right. Easy. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: The light itself is lovely, the power cord not so much.
customer_reviews.text: The adjust-ability of the light and angle make this a great lamp. The power cord completely disconnected from the adapter after a few months and now I'm on the search for a replacement power cord. It wasn't being plugged in and out of the lamp more like just picking up the lamp to move it around created a sheering at the connection point.
customer_reviews.author: nyjetgrl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing light amazing price 👌
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing light for the price!!!! I wasn't sure what to expect I bought it to do nails and I couldn't be happier!!!!! I highly recommend this light!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: melisa

customer_reviews.title: great lamp
customer_reviews.text: My mother had a similar lamp by her bed, so my son decided he wanted one. I found this and love that it has a charging port. It's easy for him to charge his Kindle. It also makes it easy for him to read in bed at night and to be able to turn out the light and roll over and go to sleep. I suspect it also makes a dandy night light on the low light setting.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Disposable - worked a few times
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Worked for 3 weeks. Almost caused a fire due to malfunctioning plug but thankfully my daughter noticed. Too late to return so $15 out the window. Went to Target and got an LED lamp at their dollar section for $5.00 that works just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Ms.M.River

customer_reviews.title: Suffer in the dark no more
customer_reviews.text: The lighting in my room wasn’t bright enough so I struggled working on my desk during the later hours in the day. This desk lamp is a lifesaver, it brightens up my work space (has three brightness levels, the first is bright enough, wouldn’t recommend buying a fancy expensive one with seven brightness levels), and the USB port is a bonus as I no longer have to keep reaching to the wall outlet to charge my phone. I also like how bendable the neck is, as it allows me to adjust it any which way I like. Overall, happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lizz

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My eyes were becoming too strained from working from home on a laptop and the terrible lighting in my home so I purchased this For my work space and it’s an incredible difference. I’m no longer straining to see, there’s different settings so it’s great for anything needing light. I use it to put in make up as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shai

customer_reviews.title: Love this Desk Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This TW Lighting IVY-40WT The IVY LED Desk Lamp with USB Port, is SO nice. There are three levels of brightness. The light is very white which makes reading paperwork very easy. Most of all I like the adjustable arm and the fact that it's not hot, like my old one. It's always helpful to save money on our electric bill too.
customer_reviews.author: JK in SC

customer_reviews.title: Great desk lamp for the money
customer_reviews.text: I really like this desk lamp, especially since it is a power saver over my last halogen lamp. The LED's are cooler and more energy efficient. I wish the bendable neck was a bit longer, but it will do. I'm trying to get use to it not being as bright as my halogen, but it is pretty bright. I Love the light touch 3 dimable settings, and the USB port on the side to charge up my cell phone. I bought the lamp in Ivory/white and it looks great. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: R Oder

customer_reviews.title: The USB is useless.
customer_reviews.text: Meaning that when I plug in my usb cord it doesn't fit flush to the plug. And then when I plug in my phone with the other end, it tells me my phone is charging very slow. Useless. But I like the lamp with the 3 different light settings. I didn't like that there were several smudges and light scratches. I would have gotten a darker color but white was the cheapest. lol
customer_reviews.author: MizMode

customer_reviews.title: Nice bedroom lamp
customer_reviews.text: Love this little lamp. We're displaced from our regular bedroom and I wanted something inexpensive as a bedside table and this fills the bill. The added USB outlet is a nice touch for recharging my iPad or iPhone. It is not quite as sexy looking as the one at Costco that is 3 times the price but it's good looking and does the job. Touch one on, a second time brighter a 3rd time brightest a 4th time off.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT desk lamp for a GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: Bought 1 of these to replace my desk lamp that uses the little halogen bulb, which used to cost me the same price this lamp cost! I love it so much, I bought another one for my other desk downstairs! So easy to turn on with different intensity of lighting, I usually use level 3! It's so darn cheap and functional! Even has a USB port on the side to charge the phone while I"m working! Get this light! You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this lamp for about 4months. I love it. It works great. I use it as a nightlight or when I’m doing someone’s manicure. I like that there’s 3 settings of brightness. I don’t really go past the first one unless I’m doing nails at night. It’s convenient that it comes with a USB port. Must admit that I wasn’t expecting much for the price but I sure am glad I opted for this option instead of unnecessarily spending more money on another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for guest bedroom
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these lamps for use on bedside tables in a guest bedroom. The little power button works well for all three brightness settings. The light is plenty bright, yet not glaring. Surprisingly to me, the contemporary style fits in fine amid country-style furniture - perhaps because the lamp is narrow and unobtrusive. These are just what I needed: inexpensive lamps that work well and blend in.
customer_reviews.author: S. Werkema

customer_reviews.title: Good but not very bright lighting
customer_reviews.text: It doesnt get very bright. Its a cool piece but this is more of a lamp id recommend if you need a dim light in a dark setting. Like ur reading a book in your bedroom and u dont want harsh lights to bother your sleeping partner. I was looking more for a desk lamp with good lighting. The light also doesnt travel far, just exactly on the location you aim it towards. Annoying. Nonetheless it works and does what it says it would do. Just didnt met my expectations
customer_reviews.author: Wavesbienn

customer_reviews.title: Nice light and brighter then I expected
customer_reviews.text: I like how you touch the power button on base to turn on the light. It has 3 brightness settings and was overall brighter then i expected. I like that is has a usb outlet to easily charge my phone while at my desk. The fact the neck bends in multiple positions is also nice
customer_reviews.author: Kaveman

customer_reviews.title: Very bright light
customer_reviews.text: No instructions, but none needed. Packaging had a piece of Styrofoam over the base to combat the scratching problem. Works like an incandescent 3 way lamp. Low, medium, high and off. Easily adjustable from 6" to 16" and is decently weighted to avoid tip overs. USB charging port works well. At this price you can't go wrong. Time will tell about the durability.
customer_reviews.author: Tim D. Hendon

customer_reviews.title: Flexible and adjustable lamp
customer_reviews.text: These lamps a bright and can be adjusted and I've found them very useful for office work and crafting. The flexibility of the lamp is useful and the head itself can even be rotated with the flexible neck to provide further diffused light. Charging your phone through it is convenient as well.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: TW Lighting Ivy desk 'goose neck" lamp white in color
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat this lamp for the price. The color was limited to the white option for this deal but it was over $5.00 less than the black one. The touch on and off is a nice feature as well as having a USB port on the side of the base for charging. I am excited abut this one.
customer_reviews.author: Marley

customer_reviews.title: Great product to have.
customer_reviews.text: I brought this lamp for my table that I do my nails on and when I am not doing nails, I use it at my desk for work. Rather than turn on the ceiling light, I use the lamp. It comes with 3 different set of lighting. I was concerned about it leaning over but it is quite sturdy. My husband also liked it and decided to use it for is DJ booth. He will have to buy his own.
customer_reviews.author: derrick/shirene

customer_reviews.title: Kinda small and basic
customer_reviews.text: Small simple lamp but it does the job. Head is reposition able like on a gooseneck. 3 brightness levels but you have to tap the exact middle of the little button area, rather than the whole base. Would've been far easier to operate if the whole base were a touch switch.
customer_reviews.author: Paul West

customer_reviews.title: Not a lamp for me, for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this lamp, the sense touch or tap is great but for practical purposes of using this lamp on a desk size small or medium just uses way too much space to have it positions so you're able to use the USB connection and place a light in a non awkward place. If it had a smaller thickness height of the base then it could slip under other footed Electronics and if it has the low profile and the base was swivel the LED light 180 degrees without it
customer_reviews.author: Lucus Edward Desimas

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Love this little lamp. I work in an office that has floor to ceiling windows, but gets dark when it is overcast. It is very skinny and compact, so it fits well into my tiny desk space. Love it and worth the price. Love that it is USB because I do not have any plug space left.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!!! Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 to upgrade my bedroom nightstand tables to a more modern sleek and small footprint instead of the big lamps I had!! These are beautiful and sooo well done for the price I was really surprised! Perfect! Not really small but has a really compact footprint.
customer_reviews.author: Writer Xwingway

customer_reviews.title: Great LED Desk Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I was quite skeptical at first but the price for the white colored option came in today and to be honest, I fell in love. The LED lamp was size pretty good, comes in a great box form. There is of course 3 lighting options and each one of them serves a great service to me now. The highest option on this lamp can light up my whole room ( my room is pretty large also.) So I would highly recommend this fairly price LED lamp. Thank you have a great day :)
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Constantly flickering
customer_reviews.text: This lamp worked great for a few weeks and now I can't even use it because it's always flickering. I have to constantly unplug it and plug it back it but 5 minutes later it's back to flickering. Spend the extra money and get yourself a higher quality desk lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected. Don't hesitate choose this one.
customer_reviews.text: Nice clean bright white light. I might actually use this for beading. I haven't tried the charging function but so far I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this. Its bright!!!!! 😎. I put it next to a gallon of water for size comparison.
customer_reviews.author: omrawr

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed after initially loving it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for doing nails. Loved this the first few uses, it was very bright and had 3 different levels of light. I’ve had it for probably 1 month and the switch no longer works, no changing level of light and the power button no longer works. At this point I plug in to turn on and unplug to turn off.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect desk/craft top lighting
customer_reviews.text: Perfect light for desktop or craft table. Great lighting with 3 levels for all needs. Also having the USB port for changing cell phones and other thing is a great bonus. I have purchased 3 of these lights so far and would buy another if the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Cadena

customer_reviews.title: Best Desk Lamp EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little light. I bought this for my kids several years back and it still works, still sturdy, and still looks new!! We love that you can adjust the brightness to it and that it has a usb charging port. There is honestly nothing bad to be said of this product. No matter where we put it, it looks nice and sleek!
customer_reviews.author: Jexika

customer_reviews.title: This is the one
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp. Uses a small amount of space. it is positional and it can charge my phone. It provides a lot of warmer natural light that doesn't hurt my eyes. I use it 8+ hours a day because of working from home and I hope to have it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Roderick

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as gifts for my coworkers and everyone loves them and the fact that they can charge a device on them. The touch button works well and the light is bright with three levels of brightness. All of the lamps are still functioning. For me, they are a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Marie

customer_reviews.title: Best desk lamp I’ve ever had!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this lamp. I’ve been looking for the perfect lamp to put on my desk and this is 100% it. It doesn’t cause any added heat and the differing brightness levels are perfect for working throughout the day or night. The added usb plug also saved my desk setup plans! Great price and great product!
customer_reviews.author: k.mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Perfact small lamp
customer_reviews.text: I needed a lamp because I cold not see the keyboard of my desktop computer. I wanted one that did not take up a lot space. This lamp was perfect and I love it. There are no bulbs that will need replacing--just plug it in and it is ready to go. To turn it on or change the intensity you just touch it. A great lamp for the price.
customer_reviews.author: fran

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one a couple of months ago to replace an old halogen desk lamp. It works so well that my wife stole it from my home office desk to use while sewing masks (sign of the times we live in). I am ordering a second one for my office
customer_reviews.author: Baixinho

customer_reviews.title: In the spotlight
customer_reviews.text: This little light is on my desk and is priceless!! I love how it looks but more importantly, I love how it has different levels of light. There are times when It is very hard to read something and this light makes the difference between seeing the tiny print and guessing!
customer_reviews.author: Esther J. Klay

product_meta.title: TW Lighting IVY-40WT The IVY LED Desk Lamp with USB Port, 3-Way Touch Switch, White
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteOur contemporary IVY LED USB Desk Lamp captivates any surface lighting application by providing up to 500 lumens of exceptional 80+ CRI light while achieving up to 71 lumens per watt. This handy energy saving desk lamp has high efficiency LEDs paired with a secondary diffuser lens to laterally advance the light onto a work area while remaining cool to the touch. This desk lamp system is an exceptional option for electrical efficiency, overall performance and value. The IVY LED Desk Lamp comes with a convenient, built-in USB charger for cell phones and devices. With 3 optional finishes of Pink (PK), Black (BK), and White (WT), it is sure to enhance any work space. The space saving design makes this desk lamp ideal for use where additional energy savings is desired. The IVY LED Desk Lamp is ideal for replacing up to 50W incandescent/halogen equivalent light sources in desk lamps used in schools, universities, offices, hotels, motels and home offices. Great for home, office, college dorm, school, hotel; Basic style for men, women, teens, kids, students; For computer or writing desk, bed side table; For homework, study, book reading, indirect light; Perfect for secretary, typist, editor, accountant and more.
feature_bullets: Built-in USB outlet port phone & Perfect device charging for charging iPhone & android smart cell phones; Extending, adjusting neck – great space saver; Cool stylish white modern contemporary design with touch dimmable brightness
3 level dimmer dimming from task to ambient light; Nichia high efficiency LED, best longest lasting; Save up to 65% energy –uses as little as 3 watts

Great for home, office, college dorm, school, hotel; Basic style for men, women, teens, kids, students; For computer or writing desk, bed side table; For homework, study, book reading, indirect light; Perfect for secretary, typist, editor, accountant and more
Energy star rated, UL listed, 12v plug-in power; 7 watts, up to 500 lumens 80+ CRI, 4000 Kelvin; USB cords not included, made in China; 14”D x 4.2”W x 16”H (extended); 76” 12V Power Cord

Due to a poor packaging from the manufacturer, we have to open each item and add additional protection to prevent scratches or dents. Please contact the seller directly for a replacement or refund if you’re not satisfied with the item.
